Package org.neo4j.internal.recordstorage

Class RecordStorageCommandCreationContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.internal.recordstorage.RecordStorageCommandCreationContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, CommandCreationContext
    class RecordStorageCommandCreationContext
extends Object
implements CommandCreationContext
    Holds commit data structures for creating records in a NeoStores.

      • nextId

        private long nextId​(StoreType storeType)

      • reserveNode

        public long reserveNode()
        Description copied from interface: CommandCreationContext
        Reserves a node id for future use to store a node. The reason for it being exposed here is that internal ids of nodes and relationships are publicly accessible all the way out to the user. This will likely change in the future though.
        Specified by:
        reserveNode in interface CommandCreationContext
        Returns:
        a reserved node id for future use.

      • reserveRelationship

        public long reserveRelationship()
        Description copied from interface: CommandCreationContext
        Reserves a relationship id for future use to store a relationship. The reason for it being exposed here is that internal ids of nodes and relationships are publicly accessible all the way out to the user. This will likely change in the future though.
        Specified by:
        reserveRelationship in interface CommandCreationContext
        Returns:
        a reserved relationship id for future use.

      • reserveSchema

        public long reserveSchema()
        Description copied from interface: CommandCreationContext
        Reserves an id for a schema record, be it for a constraint or an index, for future use to store a schema record. The reason for it being exposed here is that the record ids are used for producing unique names for indexes, which we would like to do before we get to the prepare phase
        Specified by:
        reserveSchema in interface CommandCreationContext
        Returns:
        a reserved schema record id for future use.

      • reserveRelationshipTypeTokenId

        Specified by:

        Returns:
        a unique relationship type token id.
